subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Edmonton Oilers dominated the Carolina Hurricanes in Game 6, thanks mainly to three power-play goals.  The Oilers have now forced a decisive Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: The Edmonton Oilers dominated the Carolina Hurricanes in Game 6, thanks mainly to three power-play goals.  The Oilers have now forced a decisive Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals.
